About Me


I am a computer engineering graduate student in Arizona State University. I am a code, design and zen lover. I write blogs about technique, art, culture, life and everything. I like music, especially folk and rock. I am learning guitar, cajun and sax.

“You can’t connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backward. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something — your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.”

Steve Jobs


DNClient:
iOS Designer News Client App

DNClient is a well designed iOS application for Designer News where you can find many high quality design articles. Login, upvote, comment, full screen web view and cool animations are all included. Try it right now!

  • GitHub
  • AppStore

HNClient:
iOS Hacker News Client App

HNClient is a well designed iOS application for Hacker News. Login, upvote, comment, full screen web view and cool animations are all included. Try it right now!

  • GitHub
  • AppStore

WoofMeow:
iOS Universal App for Kids

WoofMeow is designed for pet lovers and kids. Use WoofMeow to make different sounds and interact with your pet. More pets and sounds will be added in the future. Now, tap the cute pets and listen to them WOOF & MEOW!

  • GitHub
  • AppStore

BlogWebApp:
Python Blog Web Application

BlogWebApp is a full function blog website including writing blogs, user login, comment and backend management. BlogWebApp is implemented in Python3 with well designed web page view. Download and deploy it as your own blog master.

  • GitHub
  • Website

XHAngleGradientLayer:
Angle Gradient Implementation

XHAngleGradientLayer is a CALayer implementation of angle gradient. And this is the Swift version of the original AngleGradientLayer built by paiv in Objective-C.

  • GitHub

XHBubbleDragDemo:
Cool Bubble View Implementation

XHbubbleView is the UI components(circle bubble) with drag and disappear effect. This is a implementation of one UI functionality from Tencent QQ application.

  • GitHub

Demos:
iOS Animation Demos on GitHub

These are some cool animation demos I did in my free time. All are open source on GitHub. Please go to GitHub to see more details. > Don't reinvent the wheel, just realign it.
  • GitHub

StudentGig:
Online Marketplace for Students

StudentGig is a platform for college students to sale/buy used products or offer/get services. StudentGig won the **FIRST PRIZE** in *ASU 2015 Spring FSE501 Technology Entrepreneur* course. For more information, go to StudentGig website.
  • StudentGig

SafeAir:

This is a biosensor class project with an idea of a new kind of smoke detector. Check out the prototype video:
